api.networkError: Lama xiriiri karin server-ka. Fadlan hubi isku xirkaaga.
api.serverError: Qalad server ah ayaa dhacay. Fadlan mar kale isku day kadib.
api.timeout: Codsiga waqtigiisu wuu dhamaaday. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
api.unauthorized: Ma lihid fasax aad ku samayso tallaabadan.
api.conflict: Isku dhac ayaa dhacay. Khayraadku wuu jiri karaa markii hore.
api.tooManyRequests: Codsiyada aad u badan. Fadlan mar kale isku day kadib.
api.serviceUnavailable: Adeeggu si ku-meel-gaar ah uma heli karo.

auth.invalidCredentials: Iimayl ama furaha sirta ah khaldan. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
auth.sessionExpired: Fadhigaagu wuu dhamaaday. Fadlan mar kale gal.
auth.accountDisabled: Koontadaada waa la joojiyay ama ma lihid xuquuqda maamulaha.
auth.accountLocked: Koontadaada waa la xiray sababo la xiriira isku dayo badan oo fashilmay.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Isku dayo badan oo galid ah. Fadlan mar kale isku day kadib.
auth.passwordResetFailed: Dib-u-habaynta furahaagu waa fashilmay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
auth.emailNotVerified: Fadlan marka hore xaqiiji cinwaanka iimayl-kaaga.
auth.loginError: Qalad ayaa dhacday inta lagu jiro galitaanka

tenant.loadFailed: Soo rarista xogta ururka waa fashilmay.
tenant.reactivateFailed: Dib u firfircoonsiinta kiraystaha waa fashilmay.
tenant.noOrganization: Ma jiro urur la xiriira isticmaalaha.
tenant.limitReached: Xadka dukaamada waa la gaaray kiraystahan.

store.loadFailed: Soo rarista xogta dukaanka waa fashilmay.
store.alreadyExists: Dukaan magacan leh ayaa jira markii hore.

inventory.loadFailed: Soo rarista xogta agabka waa fashilmay.

order.loadFailed: Soo rarista xogta dalabka waa fashilmay.
order.alreadyProcessed: Dalabka waa la habeeyay markii hore.

payment.loadFailed: Soo rarista xogta lacag bixinta waa fashilmay.

upload.failed: Kor u qaadista faylka waa fashilmay.
upload.fileTooLarge: Cabbirka faylka ayaa ka badan inta ugu badnaan.
upload.corruptedFile: Faylku wuxuu u muuqdaa inuu burburay.
upload.uploadCancelled: Kor u qaadista waa la joojiyay.

general.unexpectedError: Qalad la filaan waayay ayaa dhacay.
general.operationFailed: Hawlgalku wuu fashilmay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
general.permissionDenied: Ma lihid fasax aad ku samayso tallaabadan.
general.requiredFieldMissing: Goobta loo baahan yahay ayaa maqan.
general.dataCorrupted: Xogtu waxay u muuqataa inay burburay.
